verses.text: Help, \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; for the godly man ceaseth; for the faithful fail from among the children of men.+ 12.1 upon…: or, upon the eighth*+ 12.1 Help: or, Save*
They speak vanity every one with his neighbour: with* flattering lips and* with a double heart do they speak.+ 12.2 a double…: Heb. an heart and an heart*
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shall cut off all flattering lips, and* the tongue that speaketh proud things:+ 12.3 proud: Heb. great*
Who have said, With our tongue will we prevail; our lips are* our own: who is* lord over us?+ 12.4 are…: Heb. are with us*

For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, now will I arise, saith the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; I will set him* in safety from him that* puffeth at him.+ 12.5 puffeth…: or, would ensnare him*
The words of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** are* pure words: as* silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.
Thou shalt keep them, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever.+ 12.7 them from: Heb. him, etc: that is, every one of them, etc*
The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted.+ 12.8 men: Heb. of the sons of the men*
